scripts.local-deploy2: npm run build && AWS_S3_FORCE_PATH_STYLE=true AWS_ENDPOINT_URL=http://localhost:4566 npx cdk deploy --context envName=local --context @aws-cdk/core:skipAssetHashContext=true --all --require-approval never
scripts.local-deploy3: AWS_ENDPOINT_URL=http://localhost:4566 AWS_ENDPOINT_URL_S3=http://localhost:4566 npx cdklocal bootstrap && npx cdklocal deploy --all --require-approval never
scripts.destroy: npm run build && npx cdk destroy
